scripts.create:lambda: yarn run transpile && yarn test && claudia create --name claudiajs-lambda --region ap-northeast-1 --config claudia-lambda.json --handler bin/lambda.handler
scripts.update:lambda: yarn run transpile && yarn test && claudia update --config claudia-lambda.json
scripts.create:api: yarn run transpile && yarn test && claudia create --name claudiajs-api --config claudia.api.json --region ap-northeast-1 --api-module bin/api
scripts.update:api: yarn run transpile && yarn test && claudia update --config claudia-api.json
